@[simp]
theorem sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_smul {R} [monoid R] [add_monoid N] [DistribMulAction R N] (r : R)
    (f : «expr →₀ » (Σi, η i) N) :

      @has_smul.smul R
        («exprΠ₀ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«exprΠ₀ , »"
          («expr →₀ » (η i) N))
        mul_action.to_has_smul r (sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp f) :=

  ext

sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_single:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →₀ » -/
@[simp]
theorem sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_single [Zero N] (a : Σi, η i) (n : N) :
    sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp (finsupp.single a n) =
      @dfinsupp.single _ (fun i => «expr →₀ » (η i) N) _ _ a.1 (finsupp.single a.2 n) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨i, a⟩ := a
  ext (j b)
  by_cases h : i = j
  · subst h
    simp [split_apply, finsupp.single_apply]
  suffices finsupp.single (⟨i, a⟩ : Σi, η i) n ⟨j, b⟩ = 0 by simp [split_apply, dif_neg h, this]
  have H : (⟨i, a⟩ : Σi, η i) ≠ ⟨j, b⟩ := by simp [h]
  rw [finsupp.single_apply, if_neg H]
#align sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_single sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_single

theorem sigma_finsupp_equiv_dfinsupp_apply [Zero N] (f : «expr →₀ » (Σi, η i) N) :
